Hey

I am trying to ignore tests from a MethodRule but the only way I have =
found to do that is to use AssumptionViolatedExcption which I don't really =
like. Is there a way to use a Statement that would cause the test to be ign=
ored. 

Like e.g return new IgnoreTest(statement, "Reason")

Best regards

=
